alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 11:57AM EST until January 20 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of a dusting to 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Wind chills between zero and 10 below. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina and southwest Virginia. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills below zero are possible through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
